OOC( Yeah, I know, it just made the story line more interesting.)

Ice::
She smiled at Lunarpine. She could tell he still cared for her as she 
did for him. 

She frowned a bit. "Well, gee, things are going to get really boring 
around here aren't they." She sighed and knew it was to the good of 
the planet.

She heard him give the order to transform. She didn't think she was 
going to change into what she already knew she could change into. She 
stood on her hind legs and engaged the transfomation order.

She felt something tingle in her body.  Huge gray wings appeared on 
her back. Her head changed into that of a great owl, but her body was 
that of a polar bear.
She squawked and roared. She looked at herself and felt something 
move inside. She Reared up and finished her transfomation into a 
Great Owl. She squawked and shifted again. Into full polar bear mode.

her bot mode was now replaced with a griffen type of mode, but 
instead of Eagle and lion, it was owl and polarbear.

She looked at Veratis in her bot mode. "OK, so how was that?" 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis stepped back at Ice's first movement toward him. He was but 
a morsel
> to her now, Her thoughts came to him and he saw the truth about her
> feelings. he extended a hand and patted her on the top of the 
head. "No harm
> was done this time, the virus was contained on time." he turned 
back to the
> scans "Until we get the virus entirely out of your system you're 
still under
> quarentine, the only contact you should have is with me or 
Lunarpine." He
> knew that if her control over her telepathic abilities was that 
fragile
> she'd know the reasons behind it.
> 
> Lunarpine grinned a devilish grin at her thoughts to him. She 
didn't have to
> tell him her fealings for him, he suspected they hadn't changed. "I 
know
> Wing me too." he said leaving Veratis out of the loop.
> 
> Veratis studied the makeup of the DNA strands. She was a bear, 
there was no
> sign of the Owl DNA. Then it hit him like a brick, the DNA strands 
were
> intertwined around her techno core. "Try and transform and see what
> happens." He told her as he tried to put together the last couple 
pieces of
> her existence. If his hypothesis (OOH Big word.) was correct there 
was more
> to her than meets the eye.(Little transformers pun intended.)
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----

> 
> > Ice::
> >
> > She looked down at Lunarpine. She had a slight smile slip across 
her
> > he face. She cold still read his mind even though he tried to hide
> > his thoughts. She was pleased that he liked her new form.
> >
> > She looked at Veratis as he scanned her. She ws glad that the 
virus
> > wasn't going to kill her or get her killed. "That is good news. 
But
> > what happens now?"
> > She read his thoughts and the smile on her face dissappeared. She
> > could read the anger in his mind. She lower her body down and 
changed
> > into full bear mode. She took a step closer to Veratis. She put 
her
> > thoughts in his head. "I'm sorry. I didn't think that I was 
hurting
> > you. I was more afraid of what Lunarpine thought and didn't want 
to
> > face that. I didn't think I could spread the virus as I was. I 
didn't
> > know it could have the effect that it could have. Or that it was
> > putting anything it touched in jeopardy."
> >
> > She nuzzled her huge head against Veratis shoulder. "I'm sorry. I
> > won't do it again."
> >
> > She turned and faced Lunarpine. She smiled again and filled his 
head
> > with thought of how much she cared for him and how much she had
> > missed him.
